overview: Presented by Found Boards & starring Mitch Rawlins “AIR” is a cinematic collage of raw & explosive wave riding never before seen. Shot on location in Australia, Indonesia & the Canary Islands “AIR” follows Bodyboarding’s most stylish & powerful free surfer across the globe in search of the ultimate ride. With a raw & explosive attack on the ocean, Mitch showcases a plethora of manoeuvres in this audio-visual sensation for the ages. With an original soundtrack recorded, mixed & mastered by The Super Trip & Sponsored by Go Pro.
title: AIR
